nodes.text: The Angrallia system was a star system located in the Fath sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the New Territories. It was home to a creature known as Angrallian Toobir.
The Angrallia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square K-6.
